description: When Justin Matthews encounters Spanish-speaking hotties Jean Franko and Lucas Fox, one might think that the language divide between them would be too great to bridge. However, he soon learns that among horny travellers certain things are universally understood, chief among them enthusiastic blowjobs and eternally hungry holes. Jean and Lucas make a meal of Justin, pounding him from both sides in their hostel room while he begs them for more. You'll be feeling a lot more than wanderlust when you see the Eiffel Tower these boys have cooked up.
title: Hostel Takeover Part 3
